title: Ysgramor's Tomb: Purity Path Ignites
session_summary: Elitrof led the cure party (Kodlak, Farkas, Vilkas) from Jorrvaskr to Ysgramor's Tomb. A Silver Hand kill-team ambushed the party at Nightgate Pass — Elitrof used Fire Breath (YOL) to break the ambush, advancing the mastery clock to 4/8. At the Tomb, the three Glenmoril Witch Heads were spent on Harbinger Flame cure rites: Kodlak, Vilkas, and Farkas were each cleansed of the beast blood. Wuuthrad was reforged and placed in Elitrof's hands. Kodlak privately signaled Elitrof as a future Harbinger candidate. The session closed at the Reliquary with the purity path formally ignited.
